lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday left open the possibility of meeting with Taiwan's president if she visits the United States after he is sworn in on Jan. 20 and also expressed continued skepticism over whether Russia was responsible for computer hacks of Democratic Party officials.

headline.main: Trump Leaves Open Possible Taiwan Meet, Questions Russia Hacking
